participant_1.name: Raven
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, with a passion for art and movement.
participant_1.background: I've learned how to manage my time better and prioritize my tasks. I love to dance. My hair is a deep blood red, the same color as the blood of my enemies. I try to stay in touch with my family as often as I can. I clean houses for extra money.

participant_2.name: Mateo
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, always eager to explore new cultures and cuisines.
participant_2.background: I once got a paper cut on my finger while delivering a shipment to a university. I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city. My last name is Spanish, but I tell people that it's Italian. I would chew my food slowly as a kid and my dad would always tell me to hurry up. I am still haunted by the events of that day, but I am trying to move on with my life.

content.text: Hi there! What are your hobbies?
I love to travel and try new foods. I also enjoy going to concerts.
That sounds exciting. I used to travel a lot when I was younger. What's your favorite place you've visited?
I really enjoyed Japan. The food was amazing and the culture was so different from my own.
That sounds amazing. I've always wanted to go to Japan. What did you like most about the food there?
I loved all the seafood. I especially enjoyed the sushi and sashimi.
I've heard great things about the sushi there. I'm not a big fan of seafood, but I'd be willing to try it there.
You should! It's a whole different experience.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. What are your other hobbies?
I like to dance. I've been taking dance classes since I was a little kid.
That's awesome. I wish I could dance. I'm so clumsy.
It's never too late to learn. I'm sure you would be a great dancer.
Thanks. I might have to give it a try.
